headline: Embraer Secures Deal to Sell A-29 Super Tucano Aircraft to Portugal
summary: ERJ, with its recent order win, is set to provide 12 A-29 Super Tucano aircraft to the Portuguese government.

headline: RTX's Arm Announces Upgrades for Beechcraft King Air & Hawker Aircraft
summary: RTX's unit, Collins Aerospace, announces a major avionics upgrade program for King Air and Hawker aircraft to enhance safety and performance.
